title: MD
biography: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Bibinagar is a public medical college and hospital located in the villages of Rangapur and Kondamadugu Bibinagar mandal, Yadadri Bhuvanagiri District Hyderabad Metropolitan Region on the Hyderabad-Warangal National Highway. It is one of the six All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMSs) that started primary operations in 2019 and has largest campus among all AIIMS in India.
aiSummary: Sarman Singh is a tropical medicine - parasitic infections specialist with an H-index of 110 at AIIMS (Faculty). Has been published in Cell, The Lancet, The Lancet Global Health. Based in India.
